58339e95d5200.author: Gambardella, Matthew
58339e95d5200.title: XML Developer's Guide
58339e95d5200.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

58339e95d5239.author: Ralls, Kim
58339e95d5239.title: Midnight Rain
58339e95d5239.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

58339e95d526f.author: Corets, Eva
58339e95d526f.title: Maeve Ascendant
58339e95d526f.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

58339e95d52a4.author: Corets, Eva
58339e95d52a4.title: Oberon's Legacy
58339e95d52a4.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

58339e95d52d9.author: Corets, Eva
58339e95d52d9.title: The Sundered Grail
58339e95d52d9.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

58339e95d530e.author: Randall, Cynthia
58339e95d530e.title: Lover Birds
58339e95d530e.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

58339e95d5343.author: Thurman, Paula
58339e95d5343.title: Splish Splash
58339e95d5343.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

58339e95d5378.author: Knorr, Stefan
58339e95d5378.title: Creepy Crawlies
58339e95d5378.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions  and other insects.

58339e95d53ae.author: Kress, Peter
58339e95d53ae.title: Paradox Lost
58339e95d53ae.description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

58339e95d53e4.author: O'Brien, Tim
58339e95d53e4.title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
58339e95d53e4.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

58339e95d5419.author: O'Brien, Tim
58339e95d5419.title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
58339e95d5419.description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.
